name: Nidoran♀
flavorText:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render this POKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

previous.name: Sandslash
previous.flavorText:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.

next.name: Nidorina
next.flavorText:
The female's horn
develops slowly.
Prefers physical attacks such as
clawing and
biting.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.flavorText:
Its hard scales
provide strong
protection. It uses its hefty
bulk to execute
powerful moves.
